welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Conselve, a charming city in the heart of Italy known for its beautiful scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and indulge in mouth-watering cuisine. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trissino Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
